package.name: ffmpeg
package.unpack: if [ -f ${SRCDIR}/${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}.tar.bz2 ] ; then tar xjf ${SRCDIR}/${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}.tar.bz2 else tar xzf ${SRCDIR}/${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}.tar.gz fi
package.build: cd ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION} sed -i 's/-lflite"/-lflite -lasound"/' configure if [ -n "$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" ] ; then jobcount=` expr $DISTCC_HOSTCOUNT '*' 2 ` export CC="distcc gcc" export CXX="distcc g++" fi ./configure --prefix=/usr \ --enable-gpl \ --enable-version3 \ --enable-nonfree \ --disable-static \ --enable-shared \ --disable-debug \ --enable-libass \ --enable-libfdk-aac \ --enable-libmp3lame \ --enable-libopus \ --enable-libtheora \ --enable-libvorbis \ --enable-libvpx \ --enable-libx264 \ --enable-x11grab if [ -n "$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" ] ; then pump make -j $jobcount else make fi # gcc tools/qt-faststart.c -o tools/qt-faststart
